displayName: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to service mongoDB port 27017
rationale: Removing unfettered connectivity service management ports reduces a server's exposure to risk.
recommended_action:
Perform the following to implement the prescribed state:
1. Login to the AWS Management Console at
https://console.aws.amazon.com/vpc/home
2. In the left pane, click Security Groups
3. For this security group, perform the following:
4. Select the security group
5. Click the Inbound Rules tab
6. Identify the rules to be removed
7. Click the x in the Remove column
8. Click Save
error_message: Security group allows ingress to mongoDB port 27017
ruleNames: Security group allows ingress to service management port
